pr_title: feat(clients/java): Add gatewayAddress method & deprecate brokerContactPoint method

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change * @param gatewayAddress the IP socket address of gateway that the client can initially connect * to. Must be in format host:port. The default value is 127.0.0.1:51015 * . * @param gatewayAddress the IP socket address of a gateway that the client can initially connect * to. Must be in format host:port. The default value is 0.0.0.0:26500 * . I know you copied from the previous setting, but it seems there was a mistake with the default value - from what I can see in ZeebeClientBuilderImpl, it will be 0.0.0.0:26500? No idea where we got the 51015 😅
timeline.author: npepinpe
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -34,9 +34,18 @@ * @param contactPoint the IP socket address of a broker that the client can initially connect to. * Must be in format host:port. The default value is 127.0.0.1:51015 * . + * @deprecated Use {@link #gatewayAddress(java.lang.String)}. */ + @Deprecated ZeebeClientBuilder brokerContactPoint(String contactPoint); + /** + * @param gatewayAddress the IP socket address of gateway that the client can initially connect + * to. Must be in format host:port. The default value is 127.0.0.1:51015 + * .

timeline.message: feat(clients/java): Add gatewayAddress method & deprecate brokerContactPoint method. Update docs.
